verses.text: The word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came again unto me, saying ,
Son of man , prophesy and say , Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Howl ye, Woe worth the day !
For the day \add is\add* near , even the day of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* near , a cloudy day ; it shall be the time of the heathen.

And the sword shall come upon Egypt , and great pain shall be in Ethiopia , when the slain shall fall in Egypt , and they shall take away her multitude , and her foundations shall be broken down.\f + \fr 30.4 \ft pain: or, fear\f*

Ethiopia , and Libya , and Lydia , and all the mingled people, and Chub , and the men of the land that is in league , shall fall with them by the sword.\f + \fr 30.5 \ft Libya: Heb. Phut\f*\f + \fr 30.5 \ft men: Heb. children\f*

Thus saith the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; They also that uphold Egypt shall fall ; and the pride of her power shall come down : from the tower of Syene shall they fall in it by the sword , saith the Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*.  +  r 30.6  t from…: or, from Migdol to Syene *
And they shall be desolate in the midst of the countries \add that are\add* desolate , and her cities shall be in the midst of the cities \add that are\add* wasted.

And they shall know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when I have set a fire in Egypt , and \add when\add* all her helpers shall be destroyed.\f + \fr 30.8 \ft destroyed: Heb. broken\f*
In that day shall messengers go forth from me in ships to make the careless Ethiopians afraid , and great pain shall come upon them, as in the day of Egypt : for, lo, it cometh.
Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I will also make the multitude of Egypt to cease by the hand of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon.
He and his people with him, the terrible of the nations , shall be brought to destroy the land : and they shall draw their swords against Egypt , and fill the land with the slain.

And I will make the rivers dry , and sell the land into the hand of the wicked : and I will make the land waste , and all that is therein , by the hand of strangers : I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have spoken \add it\add*.\f + \fr 30.12 \ft dry: Heb. drought\f*\f + \fr 30.12 \ft all…: Heb. the fulness thereof\f*

Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I will also destroy the idols , and I will cause \add their\add* images to cease out of Noph ; and there shall be no more a prince of the land of Egypt : and I will put a fear in the land of Egypt.
And I will make Pathros desolate , and will set fire in Zoan , and will execute judgments in No.\f + \fr 30.14 \ft Zoan: or, Tanis\f*
And I will pour my fury upon Sin , the strength of Egypt ; and I will cut off the multitude of No.\f + \fr 30.15 \ft Sin: or, Pelusium\f*
And I will set fire in Egypt : Sin shall have great pain , and No shall be rent asunder , and Noph \add shall have\add* distresses daily.

The young men of Aven and of Pi-beseth shall fall by the sword : and these \add cities\add* shall go into captivity.\f + \fr 30.17 \ft Aven: or, Heliopolis\f*\f + \fr 30.17 \ft Pi-beseth: or, Pubastum\f*

At Tehaphnehes also the day shall be darkened , when I shall break there the yokes of Egypt : and the pomp of her strength shall cease in her : as for her, a cloud shall cover her, and her daughters shall go into captivity.\f + \fr 30.18 \ft darkened: or, restrained\f*
Thus will I execute judgments in Egypt : and they shall know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. \p

¶ And it came to pass in the eleventh year , in the first \add month\add*, in the seventh \add day\add* of the month , \add that\add* the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, saying ,
Son of man , I have broken the arm of Pharaoh king of Egypt ; and, lo, it shall not be bound up to be healed , to put a roller to bind it, to make it strong to hold the sword.

Therefore thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I \add am\add* against Pharaoh king of Egypt , and will break his arms , the strong , and that which was broken ; and I will cause the sword to fall out of his hand.
And I will scatter the Egyptians among the nations , and will disperse them through the countries.

And I will strengthen the arms of the king of Babylon , and put my sword in his hand : but I will break Pharaoh’s arms , and he shall groan before him with the groanings of a deadly wounded \add man\add*.

But I will strengthen the arms of the king of Babylon , and the arms of Pharaoh shall fall down ; and they shall know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when I shall put my sword into the hand of the king of Babylon , and he shall stretch it out upon the land of Egypt.
And I will scatter the Egyptians among the nations , and disperse them among the countries ; and they shall know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
